rules_text: Whenever this creature attacks, if you descended this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. [i](You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Work's been [/i]too[i] easy lately. The cops must be busy with something else. Something big. Something they're not telling us!”[/i]
